title: Must Read: The Original Birkin Sells for $10 Million, Converse Names New CEO
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Friday. The original Hermès Birkin bag, designed for actor Jane Birkin, was sold at auction in Paris on Thursday for more than $10 million. The original Birkin became the most valuable fashion item sold at auction in Europe, according to ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
